message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. Given its value and features, I'm asking for $22,000. I'm confident it will be a valuable asset for you.
Hello Alice, thank you for offering me the product. After considering its value, I believe $15,000 would be a fair price for me to purchase it.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $15,000 is significantly below its true value. I'm willing to come down to $19,000.  Let me know if that works for you.
Hello Alice, I understand your position, but given my budget constraints, I am unable to go beyond $15,000 for this product. I hope we can find a mutually beneficial solution.
